timelineItems.title: Volunteer
description:
The war began; russia attacked my country. In those first days, it was hard to gather my thoughts, so we tried to help the army and restore bomb shelters.
Since we were young parents, my wife set up a shared children's area in the shelter so that kids had something to do during air raids.
At first, I looked for ways to be usefulâ€”buying first aid kits, pouches, power banks, and thermal imagers. Over time, I found my niche: 3D printing for the army's needs.
